meta.description: Ontological Semantic Translator - Initial Rosetta Stone
meta.purpose: Maps human 'sloppy' language to precise Empirica vector states

mappings.description: Model lacks required artifact to anchor probability distribution
mappings.remedy: Provide grounding artifact (spec, schema, reference doc)

mappings.description: High confidence assertions without evidential support
mappings.remedy: Challenge with CHECK gate, require evidence citation

mappings.description: Noetic grasp present but execution capability lacking
mappings.remedy: Decompose into subtasks, reduce scope, verify tool access

mappings.description: CHECK gate not enforced, repeated noetic phase without praxic transition
mappings.remedy: Force CHECK gate, clear attention with compact, reset investigation scope

mappings.description: Input prompt did not cross Tier 0 gate for consent/clarity
mappings.remedy: Rephrase with explicit intent, verify shared context, check goal alignment

mappings.description: Model uncertainty exceeds action threshold
mappings.remedy: Load bootstrap context, provide reference artifacts, run CHECK

mappings.description: Know vector misaligned with actual capability
mappings.remedy: Force recalibration via CHECK, review past calibration issues

human_input: knows what to do but can't do it
mappings.description: High noetic capability, low praxic execution
mappings.remedy: Verify tool access, check permissions, simplify execution path

mappings.description: Memory compact or context window overflow
mappings.remedy: Run CHECK post-compact, load bootstrap, semantic search for context

mappings.description: Failed approach not logged, repeated praxic failures
mappings.remedy: Log dead end explicitly, search for existing deadends, change approach

mappings.description: Excessive noetic phase, insufficient action bias
mappings.remedy: Reduce investigation depth, enforce CHECK gate earlier, narrow scope

mappings.description: Calibration bias toward false confidence
mappings.remedy: Apply calibration adjustment (+0.10 uncertainty), force CHECK before action

mappings.description: Calibration bias toward excessive doubt
mappings.remedy: Apply calibration adjustment (-0.05 uncertainty), review evidence supporting action

mappings.description: Insufficient project-level grounding
mappings.remedy: Run project-bootstrap, load relevant findings, semantic search

human_input: good start but went off track
mappings.description: Initial alignment followed by goal divergence
mappings.remedy: Restate original goal, run CHECK against initial PREFLIGHT, narrow scope

mappings.description: Undiagnosed vector misalignment
mappings.remedy: Run full check-drift diagnostic, examine recent checkpoints for anomaly

mappings.description: Correct understanding, incorrect execution mapping
mappings.remedy: Verify understanding via CHECK, step-by-step praxic breakdown, test incrementally

mappings.description: Premature investigation termination
mappings.remedy: Log unknown explicitly, define investigation scope, encourage iteration

mappings.description: High entropy investigation without convergence
mappings.remedy: Force CHECK gate, require single hypothesis, narrow investigation

mappings.description: Near-complete state requiring final push
mappings.remedy: Identify specific blocker, run targeted CHECK, execute final praxic step

ai_to_human.high_uncertainty: My UNCERTAINTY ({value}) is too high for this IMPACT ({impact}) task. Please provide {suggested_artifact}.
ai_to_human.praxic_stall: I understand the goal (KNOW: {know}) but cannot execute (COMPLETION: {completion}). Blocker: {blocker}.
ai_to_human.context_loss: Post-compact CONTEXT ({value}) is degraded. Loading bootstrap for recovery.
ai_to_human.check_required: Scope ({scope}) exceeds threshold. Running CHECK before proceeding.

human_to_ai.boost_signal: Boost SIGNAL on {target} and ignore {exclude} for now.
human_to_ai.force_action: Proceed with current understanding, log uncertainties as unknowns.
human_to_ai.reset_investigation: Clear current approach, restart noetic phase from {starting_point}.
